column5: Located in the heart of Downtown, this is your perfect central location. This town-home is located less than 1 mi from: Discovery Green, Minute Maid Park, BBVA Compass Stadium, Toyota Center, 8th Wonder Brewery, and much more. Half a mile away is the train station with connections to NRG Stadium, University of Houston, Herman Park, Main Street and the Medical Center! Free street parking is readily available and there are numerous bars and restaurants near by to keep you fed and feeling fine!
